description: Remember when I told you that you could build a quarry so that you'd never need to go mining for resources again? Well, this is the time! It wont get you --everything--, but it will get you a lot of the main ores. --Everything-- comes later.

The /b/Steam Quarry/b/ is a steam multiblock machine that uses different drills that you install onto it to dig deeper than bedrock and retrieves ores straight from the below, whatever might be under there.

You can check which ores this method will provide by checking REI. I recommend that you have multiple Steam Blast Furnaces running before you begin putting together the quarry because this will use a LOT of steel.
